column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Yue says : " The legends say the moon was the first waterbender .
#Text=" Yue says : " Our strength comes from the spirit of the moon .
#Text=Our life comes from the spirit of the ocean .
#Text=They work together to keep balance .
#Text=" Aang says : " The spirits !
#Text=Maybe I can find them and get their help !
#Text=" Yue says : " How can you do that ?
#Text=" Katara says : " The Avatar is the bridge between our world and the Spirit World !
#Text=Aang can talk to them !
#Text=" Yue says : " Maybe they 'll give you the wisdom to win this battle !
#Text=" Aang says : " Or maybe they 'll unleash a crazy amazing spirit attack on the Fire Nation !
#Text=Or wisdom .
#Text=That 's good , too .
#Text=" Katara says : " The only problem is , last time you got to the Spirit World by accident .
#Text=How are you going to get there this time ?
#Text=" Yue says : " I have an idea .
#Text=Follow me .
#Text=" Aang says : " So , is this the way to the Spirit World ?
#Text=" Yue says : " No .
#Text=You 'll have to get there on your own .
#Text=But I can take you to the most spiritual place in the entire North Pole .
#Text=" Aang says : " I never thought I 'd miss grass this much !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's so warm here !
#Text=How is that possible ?
#Text=" Yue says : " It 's the center of all spiritual energy in our land .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're right , Yue .
#Text=I can feel ... something .
#Text=It 's so tranquil .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Be quiet !
#Text=" Arnook says : " Is something wrong , Sokka ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , no .
#Text=Hahn 's out there on the top - secret mission while I 'm here sharpening my boomerang .
#Text=Everything 's fine .
#Text=" Arnook says : " Listen to me .
#Text=I took you off the mission for selfish reasons .
#Text=I have a special task in mind for you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What , you want me to scrub the barracks ?
#Text=" Arnook says : " I want you to guard my daughter , Princess Yue .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh ... Sure .
#Text=That ... should n't be too hard .
#Text="
